title: Combining intentions of fasting the missed days of Ramadan with the fasting of 9 days of dhul hijja
transcript: the first question is for M and she says that she has a number of days missed in Ramadan and now we're approaching as you all know the sacred month of and we know that the first nine days The Good Deeds are the best in them and it is recommended to fast them so is it permissible for me to join the intentions and make up for the M days of Ramadan in these nine days of the and the answer is yes you may make up for your M days of Ramadan while fasting the nine days of so you would hit two birds with one stone
